repnme.cdata!:
Jamaica - Third Structural Adjustment
            Operation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Structural Adjustment Loan
            will support the Government's program of structural
            adjustment. It will include programs to further enhance
            actions taken under the first two SALs, plus the energy
            sector. Overall, the third SAL aims at achieving export
            development and economic deregulation.  More particularly,
            the program will focus on the following problem areas: 1)
            the balance of payments situation; 2) fiscal imbalances
            caused by inadequate public sector savings; and 3) the
            sluggish performance of both the agricultural and
            manufacturing sectors. It will alson center on: 4)
            inadequacies in public administration, particularly in the
            areas of financial and personnel management; and 5)
            excessive petroleum imports. The loan will finance imports
            of raw materials, intermediate goods, non-luxury consumer
            goods, capital equipment and spare parts.
